instructions: Extract LeetCode problem details from HTML to JSON: leetcode_number, title, difficulty, problem_statement, examples, constraints, example_input, example_output, optimal_time_complexity, optimal_space_complexity.

demos.input_snippet: <html><title>25 - Reverse Nodes in k-Group</title>...Given the head of a linked list, reverse nodes k at a time...</html>
demos.output: {"leetcode_number": 25, "title": "Reverse Nodes in k-Group", "difficulty": "hard", "problem_statement": "Reverse nodes k at a time.", "examples": [{"input": "[1,2,3,4,5]", "k": 2, "output": "[2,1,4,3,5]"}], "constraints": ["1 <= k <= 5000"], "example_input": "[1,2,3,4,5]", "example_output": "[2,1,4,3,5]", "optimal_time_complexity": "O(n)", "optimal_space_complexity": "O(1)"}
